text: What is meant by 2D array support?
I read that Python does not actually support 2D arrays but rather an array of an array.
I understand the array of an array thing but what does it mean by supporting 2D arrays?
In C a 2D array is simply converted to a 1D array by doing some fancy math (Seen here).
Are there languages that implement actual 2D arrays?
Thanks for the help and I hope I haven't written a duplicate question; if so give me a link and close my question :)
